h1: How Many Calories in a Hamburger Bun?
assumptions: Standard enriched white hamburger bun, approximately 50 g, untoasted, no added butter or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, ingredients (e.g., whole grain vs. white), and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard hamburger bun contains about 120 calories and 20 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a hamburger bun?
faqs.a: Approximately 120 calories for a standard 50 g white bun.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a hamburger bun?
faqs.a: About 20 g of carbohydrates, including 1 g fiber and 3 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a whole wheat hamburger bun lower in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 10-20 fewer calories than white, with more fiber.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a hamburger bun?
faqs.a: Around 200 mg per bun, varying by brand and recipe.
No, standard buns contain 0 mg cholesterol as they are plant-based.
